title: Virtual Y Sandboxes
description: Welcome to the Virtual Y demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on Open Y and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.
intro: Welcome to the Open Y demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on Open Y and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.

cards.title: Rose: Standard Virtual Y install
cards.description: Virtual Y on Standard-level Open Y offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Rose offers sprawling site menu options and high accessibility for blind or low vision users.

cards.title: Lily: Standard Virtual Y install
cards.description: Virtual Y on Standard-level Open Y offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Lily offers bold banner headings and eye-catching tiles to organize child page content.

cards.title: Carnation: Standard Virtual Y install
cards.description: Virtual Y on Standard-level Open Y offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.
